section.p: This template represents problems or diagnoses present at the time of discharge which occurred during the hospitalization or need to be monitored after hospitalization. It requires at least one Problem Observation entry.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-16764, CONF:1198-16765, CONF:1198-32534 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Diagnosis template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-19147)/@code="11535-2" Hospital discharge diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-19148, CONF:1198-32163)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-7666, CONF:1198-7667, CONF:1198-15536)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Diagnosis template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7663, R2.1=CONF:1198-7663)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7664, R2.1=CONF:1198-7664)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-19147)/@code="11535-2" Hospital discharge diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-19148, CONF:1198-32163)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-7666, CONF:1198-7667, CONF:1198-15536)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)

body.codeblock: <act xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33"/> <code code="11535-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Hospital Discharge Diagnosis"/> <text>Text Value</text> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.113"/> <code code="75328-5" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Prognosis"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <code code="225773000" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="Preference"/> <text>Text Value</text> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> </author> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5"/> <code code="11323-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Health status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6"/> <code code="33999-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation> </entryRelationship> </act>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:16764, CONF:16765 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33"
Consol Hospital Discharge Diagnosis SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7663, R2.1=CONF:1198-7663)
Consol Hospital Discharge Diagnosis SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7664, R2.1=CONF:1198-7664)
Consol Hospital Discharge Diagnosis SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11535-2" Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7665)

Consol Hospital Discharge Diagnosis SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7666, CONF:7667, CONF:15536) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
